title: "Natural Exercises for Mind and Body Vitality"
first_phrase: In this final section, the author discusses various practices of vivification, such as the movement of the arms and the rotation of the head, which have been observed to have positive effects on psychological issues and creativity. The author also introduces practices of visual vivification, including peripheral vision, tracing the symbol of infinity, and meditating on the symbol of the sun. These practices are said to enhance one's overall vitality and lead to the activation of the "Homo Totus." The author recommends a practice of observing a light as an exercise in vivification.

last_phrase: Incorporating these practices of visual vivification into your daily life can lead to increased awareness and a deeper connection to universal concepts such as infinity and the alchemical state of "gold." Try observing a direct light source or expanding your peripheral vision with the infinity symbol exercise to cultivate a greater sense of inner light and initiative.
